J.HDR:
HouseofLords Session 2001- 02Judgments-NewspaperLicensingAgencyLimitedv.MarksandSpencerPlc(OriginalRespondentsandCross-Appellants)HOUSEOFLORDS
Lord Nicholls of Birkenhead Lord Mackay of Clashfern Lord Hoffmann Lord Hope of Craighead Lord Millett OPINIONSOFTHELORDSOFAPPEALFORJUDGMENTINTHECAUSE NEWSPAPER LICENSING AGENCY LIMITED (ORIGINAL APPELLANTS AND CROSS-RESPONDENTS) v. MARKS AND SPENCER PLC (ORIGINAL RESPONDENTS AND CROSS-APPELLANTS)ON 12 JULY 2001 [2001] UKHL 38

P.SENT: The agency pays a fee for a licence to copy the cuttings to the Newspaper Licensing Agency Limited ("the NLA"), which deals with copyright licensing on behalf of the newspapers.
